name: Spectre
description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RAMP Corporation
Size: 1
Grade: A 
Class: Stealth
The Spectre can't make your ship invisible, but it comes close. Expertly crafted by RAMP, this quantum drive disperses heat and hides IR and EM signatures to make it a great small component for those that want to go unnoticed.
description_cn:
物品类型：量子驱动器
制造商：RAMP企业
尺寸：1 
等级：A
类别：隐形
幽魂不能使您的飞船消失,但它快要消失了.该量子驱动器由RAMP精心制作,可以散发热量并隐藏红外和电磁信号,对于想要存低调的人来说是很棒的小组件.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-OmegaPro
斯坦顿(Stanton)-亚伦环-德拉玛(Delamar)-列夫斯基(Levski)-翻斗车库
